Description: Please only text to listing broker or email for showings. Electric & cold water included, but no laundry included. with 3 exclusive parking spaces.This place is located at the best part of Newton Corner. Close to all dining area, shopping area, schools & churches, only 10 mins driving to Downtown Boston. Over-sized kitchen with extended granite counter top, and a lot of solid wood kitchen cabinets, good spacious dining area with a huge granite island. Refinished hardwood flooring, bright place with a lot of sunshine. No pet, No smoking, looking for Tenants with good credit & good income
